question: 屁
sourceMnemonic: The kanji and the word are exactly the same. That means they share meanings as well.
sourceReadingMnemonic:
You learned this reading with the kanji, but here's an extra mnemonic just in case:

How do you read <vocabulary>flatulence</vocabulary>? <reading>Heh</reading>(<ja>へ</ja>)...heh..heh..heheheh. You can't NOT laugh at the word flatulence.

As with the kanji, some dictionaries incorrectly list <ja>おなら</ja> as a reading for this word, because the meaning is the same.
